{"id":882373495,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1674306651,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/882373495/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {\n        int i=0;\n        int j = s.length() - 1;\n\n        while(i < j){\n            Character c1 = Character.toLowerCase(s.charAt(i));\n            Character c2 = Character.toLowerCase(s.charAt(j));\n            if(isInValid(c1)){\n                i++;            \n                continue;\n            }\n            if(isInValid(c2)){\n                j--;\n                continue;\n            }\n\n            if(c1 != c2) return false;\n            i++; \n            j--;\n\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    public boolean isInValid(Character c){\n        return (c < 'a' || c > 'z');\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false}
